fileSamples.statement:
(WF : Wf G) : ⦗R⦘
⨾ (data ∪ ctrl ∪ addr ⨾ sb^? ∪ rfi ∪ rmw ⨾ sb^? ∪ ⦗R_ex⦘ ⨾ sb ∪ rmw_dep)⁺
  ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ⊆ sb.
fileSamples.proofString:
rewrite (addr_in_sb WF), (data_in_sb WF), (ctrl_in_sb WF).
rewrite (rmw_dep_in_sb WF), (rmw_in_sb WF).
arewrite (rfi ⊆ sb).
arewrite_id ⦗R_ex⦘.
generalize (@sb_trans G); ins; relsf.
basic_solver.

fileSamples.statement:
(WF : Wf G) : ⦗R⦘ ⨾ (sb ∪ sb ∪ sb ⨾ sb^? ∪ rfi ∪ rmw ⨾ sb^? ∪ ⦗R_ex⦘ ⨾ sb ∪ rmw_dep)⁺ ⨾ ⦗W⦘
⊆ sb.
fileSamples.proofString:
rewrite (rmw_dep_in_sb WF), (rmw_in_sb WF).
arewrite (rfi ⊆ sb).
arewrite_id ⦗R_ex⦘.
generalize (@sb_trans G); ins; relsf.
basic_solver.

fileSamples.statement: (WF : Wf G) : ⦗R⦘ ⨾ (sb ∪ sb ∪ sb ⨾ sb^? ∪ rfi ∪ sb ⨾ sb^? ∪ ⦗R_ex⦘ ⨾ sb ∪ sb)⁺ ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ⊆ sb.
fileSamples.proofString:
arewrite (rfi ⊆ sb).
arewrite_id ⦗R_ex⦘.
generalize (@sb_trans G); ins; relsf.
basic_solver.

fileSamples.statement: (WF : Wf G) : ⦗R⦘ ⨾ (sb ∪ sb ∪ sb ⨾ sb^? ∪ sb ∪ sb ⨾ sb^? ∪ ⦗R_ex⦘ ⨾ sb ∪ sb)⁺ ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ⊆ sb.
fileSamples.proofString:
arewrite_id ⦗R_ex⦘.
generalize (@sb_trans G); ins; relsf.
basic_solver.

fileSamples.statement:
(WF : Wf G) : ⦗R⦘
⨾ (sb ∪ sb ∪ sb ⨾ sb^? ∪ sb ∪ sb ⨾ sb^? ∪ ⦗fun _ : actid => True⦘ ⨾ sb ∪ sb)⁺
  ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ⊆ sb.
(WF : Wf G) (H : transitive sb) : ⦗R⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ⊆ sb.

(WF : Wf G) : ⦗R⦘ ⨾ rmw ⨾ ⦗W⦘
⊆ ⦗R⦘
  ⨾ (data ∪ ctrl ∪ addr ⨾ sb^? ∪ rfi ∪ rmw ⨾ sb^? ∪ ⦗R_ex⦘ ⨾ sb ∪ rmw_dep)⁺
    ⨾ ⦗W⦘.

(WF : Wf G) : (⦗R⦘ ⨾ rmw ⨾ ⦗W⦘) ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘
⊆ ⦗R⦘
  ⨾ (data ∪ ctrl ∪ addr ⨾ sb^? ∪ rfi ∪ rmw ⨾ sb^? ∪ ⦗R_ex⦘ ⨾ sb ∪ rmw_dep)⁺
    ⨾ ⦗W⦘.

(WF : Wf G) : (⦗R⦘ ⨾ rmw ⨾ ⦗W⦘) ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘
⊆ ⦗R⦘
  ⨾ (data ∪ ctrl ∪ addr ⨾ sb^? ∪ rfi ∪ rmw ⨾ sb^? ∪ ⦗R_ex⦘ ⨾ sb ∪ rmw_dep)
    ⨾ ⦗W⦘.

(WF : Wf G) : ⦗R⦘ ⨾ data ⨾ ⦗W⦘
⊆ ⦗R⦘
  ⨾ (data ∪ ctrl ∪ addr ⨾ sb^? ∪ rfi ∪ rmw ⨾ sb^? ∪ ⦗R_ex⦘ ⨾ sb ∪ rmw_dep)⁺
    ⨾ ⦗W⦘.
(WF : Wf G) : ⦗R⦘ ⨾ ⦗R_ex⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ⊆ ppo.
fileSamples.proofString:
unfold ppo.
hahn_frame.
rewrite <- ct_step.
eauto with hahn.

fileSamples.statement:
(WF : Wf G) : ⦗R⦘ ⨾ ⦗R_ex⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘
⊆ ⦗R⦘
  ⨾ (data ∪ ctrl ∪ addr ⨾ sb^? ∪ rfi ∪ rmw ⨾ sb^? ∪ ⦗R_ex⦘ ⨾ sb ∪ rmw_dep)⁺
    ⨾ ⦗W⦘.
fileSamples.proofString:
hahn_frame.
rewrite <- ct_step.
eauto with hahn.

fileSamples.statement:
(WF : Wf G) : ⦗R_ex⦘ ⨾ sb
⊆ (data ∪ ctrl ∪ addr ⨾ sb^? ∪ rfi ∪ rmw ⨾ sb^? ∪ ⦗R_ex⦘ ⨾ sb ∪ rmw_dep)⁺.

(WF : Wf G) : ⦗R_ex⦘ ⨾ sb
⊆ data ∪ ctrl ∪ addr ⨾ sb^? ∪ rfi ∪ rmw ⨾ sb^? ∪ ⦗R_ex⦘ ⨾ sb ∪ rmw_dep.
(WF : Wf G) : rmw ⨾ (⦗fun _ : actid => True⦘ ∪ sb) ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ⊆ ppo.
fileSamples.proofString:
rewrite seq_union_l, seq_union_r, seq_id_l.
rewrite (rmw_sb_W_in_ppo WF).
rewrite (rmw_in_ppo WF).
eauto with hahn hahn_full.

fileSamples.statement: (WF : Wf G) : rmw ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ∪ rmw ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ⊆ ppo.
fileSamples.proofString:
rewrite (rmw_sb_W_in_ppo WF).
rewrite (rmw_in_ppo WF).
eauto with hahn hahn_full.

fileSamples.statement: (WF : Wf G) : rmw ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ∪ ppo ⊆ ppo.
fileSamples.proofString:
rewrite (rmw_in_ppo WF).
eauto with hahn hahn_full.

fileSamples.statement: (WF : Wf G) : ppo ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ∪ ppo ⊆ ppo.
(WF : Wf G) : ar_int ⊆ ⦗E⦘ ⨾ ar_int ⨾ ⦗E⦘.
fileSamples.proofString:
unfold ar_int.
rewrite (wf_bobE WF), (wf_ppoE WF) at 1.
rewrite (wf_detourE WF), (@wf_sbE G), (wf_rfiE WF).
basic_solver 42.

fileSamples.statement:
(WF : Wf G) : bob ∪ ppo ∪ detour ∪ ⦗W_ex_acq⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ∪ ⦗W_ex⦘ ⨾ rfi ⨾ ⦗R ∩₁ Acq⦘
⊆ ⦗E⦘
  ⨾ (bob ∪ ppo ∪ detour ∪ ⦗W_ex_acq⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ∪ ⦗W_ex⦘ ⨾ rfi ⨾ ⦗R ∩₁ Acq⦘)
    ⨾ ⦗E⦘.
fileSamples.proofString:
rewrite (wf_bobE WF), (wf_ppoE WF) at 1.
rewrite (wf_detourE WF), (@wf_sbE G), (wf_rfiE WF).
basic_solver 42.

fileSamples.statement:
(WF : Wf G) : ⦗E⦘ ⨾ bob ⨾ ⦗E⦘ ∪ ⦗E⦘ ⨾ ppo ⨾ ⦗E⦘ ∪ detour ∪ ⦗W_ex_acq⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘
∪ ⦗W_ex⦘ ⨾ rfi ⨾ ⦗R ∩₁ Acq⦘
⊆ ⦗E⦘
  ⨾ (bob ∪ ppo ∪ detour ∪ ⦗W_ex_acq⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ∪ ⦗W_ex⦘ ⨾ rfi ⨾ ⦗R ∩₁ Acq⦘)
    ⨾ ⦗E⦘.

(WF : Wf G) : ⦗E⦘ ⨾ bob ⨾ ⦗E⦘ ∪ ⦗E⦘ ⨾ ppo ⨾ ⦗E⦘ ∪ ⦗E⦘ ⨾ detour ⨾ ⦗E⦘
∪ ⦗W_ex_acq⦘ ⨾ (⦗E⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗E⦘) ⨾ ⦗W⦘
∪ ⦗W_ex⦘ ⨾ (⦗E⦘ ⨾ rfi ⨾ ⦗E⦘) ⨾ ⦗R ∩₁ Acq⦘
⊆ ⦗E⦘
  ⨾ (bob ∪ ppo ∪ ⦗E⦘ ⨾ detour ⨾ ⦗E⦘ ∪ ⦗W_ex_acq⦘ ⨾ (⦗E⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗E⦘) ⨾ ⦗W⦘
     ∪ ⦗W_ex⦘ ⨾ (⦗E⦘ ⨾ rfi ⨾ ⦗E⦘) ⨾ ⦗R ∩₁ Acq⦘) ⨾ ⦗E⦘.
ppo ⊆ ⦗R⦘ ⨾ ppo ⨾ ⦗W⦘.
(WF : Wf G) : fwbob ⨾ ⦗R⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ⊆ fwbob.
(WF : Wf G) : fwbob ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ⊆ fwbob.
(WF : Wf G) : bob ⨾ ⦗R⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ⊆ bob.
(WF : Wf G) : bob ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ⊆ bob.
(WF : Wf G) : bob ∪ ppo ∪ detour ∪ ⦗W_ex_acq⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ∪ ⦗W_ex⦘ ⨾ rfi ⨾ ⦗R ∩₁ Acq⦘ ⊆ sb.
fileSamples.proofString:
rewrite bob_in_sb.
rewrite (ppo_in_sb WF).
arewrite (detour ⊆ sb).
arewrite (rfi ⊆ sb).
basic_solver 21.

fileSamples.statement: (WF : Wf G) : sb ∪ ppo ∪ detour ∪ ⦗W_ex_acq⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ∪ ⦗W_ex⦘ ⨾ rfi ⨾ ⦗R ∩₁ Acq⦘ ⊆ sb.
fileSamples.proofString:
rewrite (ppo_in_sb WF).
arewrite (detour ⊆ sb).
arewrite (rfi ⊆ sb).
basic_solver 21.

fileSamples.statement: (WF : Wf G) : sb ∪ sb ∪ detour ∪ ⦗W_ex_acq⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ∪ ⦗W_ex⦘ ⨾ rfi ⨾ ⦗R ∩₁ Acq⦘ ⊆ sb.
(WF : Wf G) : sb ∪ sb ∪ sb ∪ ⦗W_ex_acq⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ∪ ⦗W_ex⦘ ⨾ rfi ⨾ ⦗R ∩₁ Acq⦘ ⊆ sb.
(WF : Wf G) : sb ∪ sb ∪ sb ∪ ⦗W_ex_acq⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ∪ ⦗W_ex⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗R ∩₁ Acq⦘ ⊆ sb.

(⦗R⦘
 ⨾ (data ∪ ctrl ∪ addr ⨾ sb^? ∪ rfi ∪ rmw ⨾ sb^? ∪ ⦗R_ex⦘ ⨾ sb ∪ rmw_dep)⁺
   ⨾ ⦗W⦘)
⨾ rfi
  ⨾ ⦗R⦘
    ⨾ (data ∪ ctrl ∪ addr ⨾ sb^? ∪ rfi ∪ rmw ⨾ sb^? ∪ ⦗R_ex⦘ ⨾ sb ∪ rmw_dep)⁺
      ⨾ ⦗W⦘
⊆ ⦗R⦘
  ⨾ (data ∪ ctrl ∪ addr ⨾ sb^? ∪ rfi ∪ rmw ⨾ sb^? ∪ ⦗R_ex⦘ ⨾ sb ∪ rmw_dep)⁺
    ⨾ ⦗W⦘.
fileSamples.proofString:
rewrite !seqA.
arewrite_id ⦗W⦘ at 1.
arewrite_id ⦗R⦘ at 2.
arewrite (rfi ⊆ (data ∪ ctrl ∪ addr ⨾ sb^? ∪ rfi ∪ rmw ⨾ sb^? ∪ ⦗R_ex⦘ ⨾ sb ∪ rmw_dep)＊) at 2.
rewrite rtE, <- ct_step.
eauto with hahn.
rewrite inclusion_t_rt at 1.
relsf.

fileSamples.statement:
⦗R⦘
⨾ (data ∪ ctrl ∪ addr ⨾ sb^? ∪ rfi ∪ rmw ⨾ sb^? ∪ ⦗R_ex⦘ ⨾ sb ∪ rmw_dep)⁺
  ⨾ ⦗W⦘
    ⨾ rfi
      ⨾ ⦗R⦘
        ⨾ (data ∪ ctrl ∪ addr ⨾ sb^? ∪ rfi ∪ rmw ⨾ sb^? ∪ ⦗R_ex⦘ ⨾ sb
           ∪ rmw_dep)⁺ ⨾ ⦗W⦘
⊆ ⦗R⦘
  ⨾ (data ∪ ctrl ∪ addr ⨾ sb^? ∪ rfi ∪ rmw ⨾ sb^? ∪ ⦗R_ex⦘ ⨾ sb ∪ rmw_dep)⁺
    ⨾ ⦗W⦘.
fileSamples.proofString:
arewrite_id ⦗W⦘ at 1.
arewrite_id ⦗R⦘ at 2.
arewrite (rfi ⊆ (data ∪ ctrl ∪ addr ⨾ sb^? ∪ rfi ∪ rmw ⨾ sb^? ∪ ⦗R_ex⦘ ⨾ sb ∪ rmw_dep)＊) at 2.
rewrite rtE, <- ct_step.
eauto with hahn.
rewrite inclusion_t_rt at 1.
relsf.

fileSamples.statement:
⦗R⦘
⨾ (data ∪ ctrl ∪ addr ⨾ sb^? ∪ rfi ∪ rmw ⨾ sb^? ∪ ⦗R_ex⦘ ⨾ sb ∪ rmw_dep)⁺
  ⨾ ⦗fun _ : actid => True⦘
    ⨾ rfi
      ⨾ ⦗R⦘
        ⨾ (data ∪ ctrl ∪ addr ⨾ sb^? ∪ rfi ∪ rmw ⨾ sb^? ∪ ⦗R_ex⦘ ⨾ sb
           ∪ rmw_dep)⁺ ⨾ ⦗W⦘
⊆ ⦗R⦘
  ⨾ (data ∪ ctrl ∪ addr ⨾ sb^? ∪ rfi ∪ rmw ⨾ sb^? ∪ ⦗R_ex⦘ ⨾ sb ∪ rmw_dep)⁺
    ⨾ ⦗W⦘.
fileSamples.proofString:
arewrite_id ⦗R⦘ at 2.
arewrite (rfi ⊆ (data ∪ ctrl ∪ addr ⨾ sb^? ∪ rfi ∪ rmw ⨾ sb^? ∪ ⦗R_ex⦘ ⨾ sb ∪ rmw_dep)＊) at 2.
rewrite rtE, <- ct_step.
eauto with hahn.
rewrite inclusion_t_rt at 1.
relsf.

fileSamples.statement:
⦗R⦘
⨾ (data ∪ ctrl ∪ addr ⨾ sb^? ∪ rfi ∪ rmw ⨾ sb^? ∪ ⦗R_ex⦘ ⨾ sb ∪ rmw_dep)⁺
  ⨾ ⦗fun _ : actid => True⦘
    ⨾ rfi
      ⨾ ⦗fun _ : actid => True⦘
        ⨾ (data ∪ ctrl ∪ addr ⨾ sb^? ∪ rfi ∪ rmw ⨾ sb^? ∪ ⦗R_ex⦘ ⨾ sb
           ∪ rmw_dep)⁺ ⨾ ⦗W⦘
⊆ ⦗R⦘
  ⨾ (data ∪ ctrl ∪ addr ⨾ sb^? ∪ rfi ∪ rmw ⨾ sb^? ∪ ⦗R_ex⦘ ⨾ sb ∪ rmw_dep)⁺
    ⨾ ⦗W⦘.
fileSamples.proofString:
arewrite (rfi ⊆ (data ∪ ctrl ∪ addr ⨾ sb^? ∪ rfi ∪ rmw ⨾ sb^? ∪ ⦗R_ex⦘ ⨾ sb ∪ rmw_dep)＊) at 2.
rewrite rtE, <- ct_step.
eauto with hahn.
rewrite inclusion_t_rt at 1.
relsf.

fileSamples.statement: rfi ⊆ (data ∪ ctrl ∪ addr ⨾ sb^? ∪ rfi ∪ rmw ⨾ sb^? ∪ ⦗R_ex⦘ ⨾ sb ∪ rmw_dep)＊.
fileSamples.proofString:
rewrite rtE, <- ct_step.
eauto with hahn.

fileSamples.statement:
rfi
⊆ ⦗fun _ : actid => True⦘
  ∪ (data ∪ ctrl ∪ addr ⨾ sb^? ∪ rfi ∪ rmw ⨾ sb^? ∪ ⦗R_ex⦘ ⨾ sb ∪ rmw_dep).

⦗R⦘
⨾ (data ∪ ctrl ∪ addr ⨾ sb^? ∪ rfi ∪ rmw ⨾ sb^? ∪ ⦗R_ex⦘ ⨾ sb ∪ rmw_dep)⁺
  ⨾ ⦗fun _ : actid => True⦘
    ⨾ (data ∪ ctrl ∪ addr ⨾ sb^? ∪ rfi ∪ rmw ⨾ sb^? ∪ ⦗R_ex⦘ ⨾ sb ∪ rmw_dep)＊
      ⨾ ⦗fun _ : actid => True⦘
        ⨾ (data ∪ ctrl ∪ addr ⨾ sb^? ∪ rfi ∪ rmw ⨾ sb^? ∪ ⦗R_ex⦘ ⨾ sb
           ∪ rmw_dep)⁺ ⨾ ⦗W⦘
⊆ ⦗R⦘
  ⨾ (data ∪ ctrl ∪ addr ⨾ sb^? ∪ rfi ∪ rmw ⨾ sb^? ∪ ⦗R_ex⦘ ⨾ sb ∪ rmw_dep)⁺
    ⨾ ⦗W⦘.

⦗R⦘
⨾ (data ∪ ctrl ∪ addr ⨾ sb^? ∪ rfi ∪ rmw ⨾ sb^? ∪ ⦗R_ex⦘ ⨾ sb ∪ rmw_dep)＊
  ⨾ ⦗fun _ : actid => True⦘
    ⨾ (data ∪ ctrl ∪ addr ⨾ sb^? ∪ rfi ∪ rmw ⨾ sb^? ∪ ⦗R_ex⦘ ⨾ sb ∪ rmw_dep)＊
      ⨾ ⦗fun _ : actid => True⦘
        ⨾ (data ∪ ctrl ∪ addr ⨾ sb^? ∪ rfi ∪ rmw ⨾ sb^? ∪ ⦗R_ex⦘ ⨾ sb
           ∪ rmw_dep)⁺ ⨾ ⦗W⦘
⊆ ⦗R⦘
  ⨾ (data ∪ ctrl ∪ addr ⨾ sb^? ∪ rfi ∪ rmw ⨾ sb^? ∪ ⦗R_ex⦘ ⨾ sb ∪ rmw_dep)⁺
    ⨾ ⦗W⦘.

⦗R⦘ ⨾ (data ∪ addr ∪ ctrl ∪ rfi)⁺ ⨾ ⦗W⦘
⊆ ⦗R⦘
  ⨾ (data ∪ ctrl ∪ addr ⨾ sb^? ∪ rfi ∪ rmw ⨾ sb^? ∪ ⦗R_ex⦘ ⨾ sb ∪ rmw_dep)⁺
    ⨾ ⦗W⦘.

(data ∪ addr ∪ ctrl ∪ rfi)⁺
⊆ (data ∪ ctrl ∪ addr ⨾ sb^? ∪ rfi ∪ rmw ⨾ sb^? ∪ ⦗R_ex⦘ ⨾ sb ∪ rmw_dep)⁺.
bob ⊆ bob ∪ ppo ∪ detour ∪ ⦗W_ex_acq⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ∪ ⦗W_ex⦘ ⨾ rfi ⨾ ⦗R ∩₁ Acq⦘.
ppo ⊆ bob ∪ ppo ∪ detour ∪ ⦗W_ex_acq⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ∪ ⦗W_ex⦘ ⨾ rfi ⨾ ⦗R ∩₁ Acq⦘.

detour
⊆ bob ∪ ppo ∪ detour ∪ ⦗W_ex_acq⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ∪ ⦗W_ex⦘ ⨾ rfi ⨾ ⦗R ∩₁ Acq⦘.

⦗W_ex_acq⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘
⊆ bob ∪ ppo ∪ detour ∪ ⦗W_ex_acq⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ∪ ⦗W_ex⦘ ⨾ rfi ⨾ ⦗R ∩₁ Acq⦘.

⦗W_ex⦘ ⨾ rfi ⨾ ⦗R ∩₁ Acq⦘
⊆ bob ∪ ppo ∪ detour ∪ ⦗W_ex_acq⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ∪ ⦗W_ex⦘ ⨾ rfi ⨾ ⦗R ∩₁ Acq⦘.
(WF : Wf G) : bob ∪ ppo ∪ ⦗W_ex_acq⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ⊆ bob ∪ ⦗W_ex_acq⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ∪ ppo.

(WF : Wf G) : (bob ∪ ⦗W_ex_acq⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ∪ ppo)⁺
⊆ ppo ∪ ppo^? ⨾ (bob ∪ ⦗W_ex_acq⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘)⁺.
fileSamples.proofString:
apply ct_ind_left with (P:= fun r =>  r).
by auto with hahn.
arewrite(bob ⊆ (bob ∪ ⦗W_ex_acq⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘)⁺).
arewrite(⦗W_ex_acq⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ⊆ (bob ∪ ⦗W_ex_acq⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘)⁺) at 2.
basic_solver 12.
intros k H.
rewrite H; clear k H; rewrite crE; relsf; unionL.
rewrite (bob_ppo WF).
arewrite(bob ⊆ (bob ∪ ⦗W_ex_acq⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘)⁺).
basic_solver.
rewrite (wf_ppoD) at 1.
type_solver.
rewrite (wf_ppoD) at 1 2.
type_solver.
arewrite(bob ⊆ (bob ∪ ⦗W_ex_acq⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘)＊); relsf.
sin_rewrite (bob_ppo WF).
arewrite(bob ⊆ (bob ∪ ⦗W_ex_acq⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘)＊); relsf.
arewrite(⦗W_ex_acq⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ⊆ (bob ∪ ⦗W_ex_acq⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘)＊) at 1; relsf.
rewrite (wf_ppoD) at 1.
type_solver.
basic_solver 12.
rewrite (wf_ppoD) at 1 2.
type_solver.

fileSamples.statement: (WF : Wf G) : good_ctx (fun r : relation actid => r).

(WF : Wf G) : bob ∪ ⦗W_ex_acq⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ∪ ppo
⊆ ppo ∪ ppo^? ⨾ (bob ∪ ⦗W_ex_acq⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘)⁺.
fileSamples.proofString:
arewrite(bob ⊆ (bob ∪ ⦗W_ex_acq⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘)⁺).
arewrite(⦗W_ex_acq⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ⊆ (bob ∪ ⦗W_ex_acq⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘)⁺) at 2.
basic_solver 12.

fileSamples.statement:
(WF : Wf G) : (bob ∪ ⦗W_ex_acq⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘)⁺ ∪ ⦗W_ex_acq⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ∪ ppo
⊆ ppo ∪ ppo^? ⨾ (bob ∪ ⦗W_ex_acq⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘)⁺.

(WF : Wf G) : (bob ∪ ⦗W_ex_acq⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘)⁺ ∪ (bob ∪ ⦗W_ex_acq⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘)⁺ ∪ ppo
⊆ ppo ∪ ppo^? ⨾ (bob ∪ ⦗W_ex_acq⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘)⁺.

(WF : Wf G) : forall k : relation actid,
k ⊆ ppo ∪ ppo^? ⨾ (bob ∪ ⦗W_ex_acq⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘)⁺ ->
(bob ∪ ⦗W_ex_acq⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ∪ ppo) ⨾ k
⊆ ppo ∪ ppo^? ⨾ (bob ∪ ⦗W_ex_acq⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘)⁺.
fileSamples.proofString:
intros k H.
